greeting.choose: Discover the city with comfort and reliability - every trip is gonna be special!

card1.title: Convenient Payment Options
card1.text: We accept all payment methods – cash, non-cash, and offer invoicing for corporate clients. We handle all paperwork.

card2.title: Experienced Drivers
card2.text: Our drivers are professionals with years of experience and top qualifications. They know the routes well and ensure safe and comfortable trips.

card3.title: Video Surveillance System
card3.text: All our buses are equipped with cameras, providing full control over the journey. You can monitor the route in real-time.

card4.title: Comfortable Climate
card4.text: Every bus is equipped with modern air conditioners to maintain an ideal climate throughout the trip.

card5.title: GPS Tracking
card5.text: All buses are equipped with GPS systems, allowing real-time tracking of the route.

card6.title: Custom Routes
card6.text: We are ready to create a route tailored to your needs, ensuring the most convenient and efficient transportation.

card7.title: New and Reliable Buses
card7.text: Our fleet consists of modern and new buses, which are regularly maintained. Your comfort and safety are our priority.

city.title: CITY ROUTES
city.description: Our specialists independently plan routes and are fully responsible for their organization and administration. We know the city like the back of our hand, which allows us to offer the most optimal paths, minimizing travel time and ensuring passenger comfort.
city.bottomText: Over the years, we have successfully developed and completed more than {{count}} city routes.

intercity.title: INTERCITY TRIPS
intercity.description: We easily organize intercity trips of any complexity. Want to relax in Borovoye, departing from Astana? We'll make your journey comfortable and safe. Our buses are perfectly suited for long trips, providing reliable and convenient transportation for any distance.
intercity.bottomText: No matter where you're heading, we always offer the optimal solution for your route.
